# nat-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                       | Type                                                        | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `count`   | `count`   | Numeric count to display in badge                 | `number`                                                    | `undefined` |
| `dot`     | `dot`     | Display as a dot indicator instead of text/number | `boolean`                                                   | `false`     |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of the badge                                 | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                      | `'md'`      |
| `variant` | `variant` | Visual style variant of the badge                 | `"danger" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                    |
| ---- | ------------------------------ |
|      | Badge content (text or number) |
